I’m Henry Desroches, an espresso-drinking, sighthound-fostering, fixed-gear-riding creative front-end developer from Denver, Colorado. I’m really into great coffee, great pizza, and great design.

I’m passionate about cutting-edge front-end, pixel perfect, beautiful user interfaces, and meticulously researched UX.

I’m currently seeking full-time, front-end employment in San Francisco.
